title: Utilities - TypeScript
description: Convert utility functions from JavaScript to TypeScript. These are helper functions for validation, object manipulation, number utilities, etc.

tasks.description: Convert validation utilities: is.js, isInteger.js, isNumeric.js, etc. to TypeScript with proper type guards
Convert object utilities: object.js, array.js, collection.js to TypeScript
Convert string utilities: string.js, customs.js to TypeScript
Convert remaining utilities: snapshot.js, emitter.js, lazy.js, etc. to TypeScript

acceptanceCriteria: All 28 utility files converted to TypeScript
